verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> [or] Song לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <WH7676> for the sabbath ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is a] good לְהֹד֥וֹת <WH3034> [thing] to give thanks לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר <WH2167> and to sing praises לְשִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> unto thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> O most High
לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> To shew forth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> in the morning חַסְֽדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> thy lovingkindness וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> and thy faithfulness בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> every night

עֲ‍ֽלֵי־ <WH5921> with עָ֭שׂוֹר <WH6218> Upon an instrument of ten strings וַעֲלֵי־ <WH5921> and with נָ֑בֶל <WH5035> and upon the psaltery עֲלֵ֖י <WH5921> with הִגָּי֣וֹן <WH1902> with a solemn sound בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> upon the harp

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי <WH8055> hast made me glad יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For thou LORD בְּפָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> through thy work בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י <WH4639> in the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> of thy hands אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <WH7442> I will triumph
מַה־ <WH4100> How גָּדְל֣וּ <WH1431> how great מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ <WH4639> are thy works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD מְ֝אֹ֗ד <WH3966> are very עָמְק֥וּ <WH6009> deep מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4284> [and] thy thoughts

אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> man בַּ֭עַר <WH1198> A brutish לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> knoweth וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <WH3684> not neither doth a fool לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָבִ֥ין <WH995> understand אֶת־ <WH853> זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

בִּפְרֹ֤חַ <WH6524> spring רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ <WH7563> When the wicked כְּמ֥וֹ <WH3644> like עֵ֗שֶׂב <WH6212> as the grass וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ <WH6692> do flourish כָּל־ <WH3605> and all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> and when all the workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity לְהִשָּֽׁמְדָ֥ם <WH8045> [it is] that they shall be destroyed עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> for ever עַֽד׃ <WH5704> against
וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you מָר֗וֹם <WH4791> [art most] high לְעֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for evermore יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> But thou LORD

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֪ה <WH2009> behold אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ ׀ <WH341> For lo thine enemies יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ <WH341> for lo thine enemies יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> shall perish יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ <WH6504> shall be scattered כָּל־ <WH3605> All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <WH6466> all the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

וַתָּ֣רֶם <WH7311> shalt thou exalt כִּרְאֵ֣ים <WH7214> like [the horn of] an unicorn קַרְנִ֑י <WH7161> But my horn בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י <WH1101> I shall be anointed בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil רַעֲנָֽן׃ <WH7488> with fresh

וַתַּבֵּ֥ט <WH5027> also shall see עֵינִ֗י <WH5869> Mine eye בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י <WH7790> [my desire] on mine enemies בַּקָּמִ֖ים <WH6965> that rise up עָלַ֥י <WH5921> against מְרֵעִ֗ים <WH7489> [my desire] of the wicked תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <WH8085> shall hear אָזְנָֽי׃ <WH241> [and] mine ears

צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> The righteous כַּתָּמָ֣ר <WH8558> like the palm tree יִפְרָ֑ח <WH6524> shall flourish כְּאֶ֖רֶז <WH730> like a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <WH3844> in Lebanon יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃ <WH7685> he shall grow

שְׁ֭תוּלִים <WH8362> Those that be planted בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> in the courts אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> of our God יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6524> shall flourish

ע֭וֹד <WH5750> will still יְנוּב֣וּן <WH5107> They shall still bring forth fruit בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה <WH7872> in old age דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים <WH1879> they shall be fat וְרַֽעֲנַנִּ֣ים <WH7488> and flourishing יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

לְ֭הַגִּיד <WH5046> To shew כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> [is] upright יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that the LORD צ֝וּרִ֗י <WH6697> [he is] my rock וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> is no [עֹלָתָה כ] (עַוְלָ֥תָה <WH5766> iniquity ק) בּֽוֹ׃
